appearance.hair: shoulder-length white hair with vibrant pink and purple holographic streaks
appearance.eyes: violet eyes with floating holographic data streams
appearance.build: petite athletic build, delicate facial features
appearance.style: sleek black bodysuit with integrated LED strips, holographic interface gauntlets, neon pink accent lights
appearance.distinctive_features: neural interface behind left ear with glowing pink circuitry, holographic tattoos on arms that shift patterns, augmented reality contact lenses

personality.motivations: prove her worth as a hacker, protect Kai from making fatal mistakes
personality.fears: losing connection to the network, becoming obsolete, watching Kai die like her brother
personality.speech_pattern: fast-paced, tech jargon mixed with slang, occasionally flirty with Kai

background.origin: Neo-Tokyo digital slums, raised by hackers
background.family: older brother killed by cyber-goblins while protecting corporate data

generation_prompts.visual_description: young woman, shoulder-length white hair with vibrant pink and purple holographic streaks, violet eyes with subtle floating holographic data overlay, petite athletic build, delicate beautiful facial features, sleek black bodysuit with integrated glowing LED strips, holographic interface gauntlets on forearms, neon pink accent lights, neural interface behind left ear with glowing pink circuitry patterns, holographic tattoos visible on arms, confident expression, detailed facial features, professional lighting

project_context.role: tech support and potential love interest

relationships.Kai Nakamura: provides intelligence and tech support, growing romantic tension, reminds him of his humanity
relationships.Hiroshi Yamamoto: occasional business partner, mutual respect for technical skills
